Russia to formally annex four more areas of Ukraine Russia's Vladimir Putin will hold a signing ceremony on Friday formally annexing four more areas of Ukraine after conducting self-styled referendums condemned by Ukraine and the West as a sham. Russian-backed officials had earlier claimed the five-day exercise had secured almost total support from those who took part, although no independent monitoring took place.
